name: Mini Lights Out (Stobros)
description:
This is basically a clone of the electronic game called Lights Out, where your goal is to switch the lights off or into the same light color at the least amount of clicks possible.

You can choose from three different board sizes: 3x3, 4x3, and 4x4.

After selecting the board size, choose from three different game modes: Classic, which has only two states: off, on, 2000, which has three states: off, red, green, and a third mode I called NEO, which is like 2000, but with a fourth state: blue. 2000 and NEO are currently exclusive to 3x3.

Then, choose whether the board has horizontal and/or vertical wrap-around  to make the game a bit more interesting. This feature is exclusive to 4x3 and 4x4 boards, albeit you can't play 4x3 with both wrap-arounds, or 4x4 without any wrap-around.

There are 8 playable configurations in this game, so better try them out.

Once you're satisfied with the game conditions, it's time to play the game!
